Package com.flipfit.business

Interface gymOwnerInterface

public interface gymOwnerInterface
The GymOwnerInterface defines the contract for all gym owner-related operations. Any class that implements this interface must provide the functionality to manage gym centers, view customer information, and edit owner details.
Author:

    Method
    Description
    void
    addCentre(GymCentre gymData)
    Adds a new gym center to the system.
    void
    displayGymOwnerMenu(int loggedInOwnerId)

  • Method Details

    • addCentre

      void addCentre(GymCentre gymData)
      Adds a new gym center to the system.
      Parameters:
      gymData - A GymCentre object containing the details of the new gym center.

    • viewGymDetails

      void viewGymDetails(int ownerId)
      Retrieves and displays the details of all gym centers owned by a specific gym owner.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The unique ID of the gym owner.

    • viewCustomers

      void viewCustomers()
      Retrieves and displays the list of customers for the gym owner's centers.

    • viewPayments

      void viewPayments()
      Retrieves and displays the payment history for the gym owner.

    • editGymOwnerDetails

      void editGymOwnerDetails(int ownerId, int choice, String newValue)
      Updates a specific detail for the gym owner.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The ID of the gym owner whose details are to be updated.
      choice - An integer representing the detail to be updated (e.g., 1 for name, 2 for email).
      newValue - The new value for the selected detail.

    • displayGymOwnerMenu

      void displayGymOwnerMenu(int loggedInOwnerId)
      Displays the main menu for a logged-in gym owner and handles user input.
      Parameters:
      loggedInOwnerId - The ID of the currently logged-in gym owner.
